fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2

Interface GlobalSimulationConfigurationI


  • public interface GlobalSimulationConfigurationI
    The class GlobalSimulationConfigurationI defines configuration parameters for the household energy management simulator.

    Description

    The simulation models assumes that the power unit used by the electric meter is MeasurementUnit.AMPERES and that the tension of appliances is 220.0 volts for all of them.

    Invariants

     invariant       MeasurementUnit.AMPERES.equals(ElectricMeterImplementationI.POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       MeasurementUnit.VOLTS.equals(ElectricMeterImplementationI.TENSION_UNIT)
 invariant       (new Measure<Double>(220.0, MeasurementUnit.VOLTS)).equals(ElectricMeter.TENSION)
 invariant       TIME_UNIT != null

    Created on : 2025-10-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double ACCELERATION_FACTOR
      acceleration factor for the real time simulation; with a factor 2.0, the simulation runs two times faster than real time i.e., a run that is supposed to take 10 seconds in real time will take 5 seconds to execute.
      static double BATTERIES_LEVEL_INTEGRATION_QUANTUM
      in the QSS integration algorithm, the standard level quantum between successive points computations.
      static int DETERMINISTIC_SUNRISE_HOUR
      when using the deterministic sunrise and sunset model, the hour of sunrise each day.
      static int DETERMINISTIC_SUNSET_HOUR
      when using the deterministic sunrise and sunset model, the hour of sunset each day.
      static java.time.Instant END_INSTANT
      the end instant used in the test scenarios.
      static double FUEL_LEVEL_INTEGRATION_QUANTUM
      in the QSS integration algorithm, the standard level quantum between successive points computations.
      static double INITIAL_BATTERIES_LEVEL
      initial charge level of the batteries in MeasurementUnit.WATTS.
      static double INITIAL_TANK_LEVEL
      initial FUEL level of the TANK in MeasurementUnit.LITERS.
      static SolarPanelEventI.Position LATITUDE
      latitude of the solar panel.
      static SolarPanelEventI.Position LONGITUDE
      longitude of the solar panel.
      static int NB_SQUARE_METERS
      available number of square meters of solar panel.
      static int NUMBER_OF_CELL_GROUPS_IN_SERIES
      number of groups of parallel batteries cells put in series to get a better total capacity.
      static int NUMBER_OF_PARALLEL_CELLS
      number of batteries cells put in parallel to get a better maximum output power.
      static double ORIENTATION
      Sun azimuth from the solar panel, in degrees, north-based; this is the direction along the horizon, measured from north to east (or example, 0.0 means north, 135.0 means southeast, 270.0 means west.
      static double SLOPE
      slope of the solar panel.
      static double SOLAR_PANEL_POWER_MODEL_STEP
      delay between successive updates of the sun intensity.
      static java.time.Instant START_INSTANT
      a start Instant for the simulation, corresponding to the start time for the simulation clock.
      static fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time START_TIME
      the start time in simulated time, corresponding to START_INSTANT.
      static double SUN_INTENSITY_MODEL_STEP
      delay between successive updates of the sun intensity.
      static double TANK_CAPACITY
      capacity of the TANK in MeasurementUnit.LITERS.
      static java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit TIME_UNIT
      time unit used in the heater simulator.
      static java.time.ZoneId ZONE
      time zone of the solar panel.
